channel.title: RuneScape...Instant Demo?
channel.description:
LMFAO! RuneScape just updated a "Instant Demo" I really like it!
You start making you'r own new charecter, then do a quest, Bla Bla Bla...
Go to [url=http://www.runescape.com]RuneScape [/url]and check it out!

item.title: RuneScape...Instant Demo?
item.dc:creator: @King_Zuber King_Zuber
item.description:
@King_Zuber wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:20, topic:337642”][quote author=King_Zuber link=topic=434046.msg3188290#msg3188290 date=1271984138]
Hmm, I think they’ve been looking at WoW’s website and that probably inspired / pushed them into making these recent updates. Keep in mind that WoW is releasing a new game add on or what ever.
[/quote]
Wow’s game play style is completely different and unique. I can’t believe there’s still retards out there that think they’re copying WOW. Because they’re not, its called catching up with the newer generation.[/quote]

You have a point but I never said they are copying, I said they’re trying to use some aspects of that game and import it into their’s. All companies do this, Cars, Games, etc. They all get ideas from other products.

Read full topic

King_Zuber:

Hmm, I think they’ve been looking at WoW’s website and that probably inspired / pushed them into making these recent updates. Keep in mind that WoW is releasing a new game add on or what ever.

Wow’s game play style is completely different and unique. I can’t believe there’s still retards out there that think they’re copying WOW. Because they’re not, its called catching up with the newer generation.

item.title: RuneScape...Instant Demo?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:14, topic:337642”][quote author=Newty link=topic=434046.msg3187757#msg3187757 date=1271944513]
It was a ‘minor’ update that they felt inclined to mention at the very end of the new slayer update.

RuneScape

Slayer Challenges

The other Slayer Masters have taken some inspiration from Kuradal�s lava creature challenge and have come up with their own unique tasks to put your abilities as a slayer to the test. Completing these optional missions will award you with additional...

Voices have been implemented for all NPCs (and the player) within the tutorial. We’ve also made demo mode available to all players on the login screen. Demo mode is a quick way to try out the game from the beginning without the need to create an account. We would recommend that you try out the updated tutorial using our new demo mode.

[/quote]

Yh, but unfortinutly I am not a member (spelled it wrong I know…)[/quote]You don’t need to be a member…

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:12, topic:337642”]I can’t find it on the site. You always make these threads about RS updates, but you never go into detail. It’s like you just go on here as quick as possible so that you can post the update before someone else does.[/quote]When you play, when you get to choose like ‘Free Game’ or ‘Member Game’, they added another option that says ‘Instant Demo’.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape...Instant Demo?

[quote=“Newty, post:13, topic:337642”]It was a ‘minor’ update that they felt inclined to mention at the very end of the new slayer update.

RuneScape

Slayer Challenges

The other Slayer Masters have taken some inspiration from Kuradal�s lava creature challenge and have come up with their own unique tasks to put your abilities as a slayer to the test. Completing these optional missions will award you with additional...

Voices have been implemented for all NPCs (and the player) within the tutorial. We’ve also made demo mode available to all players on the login screen. Demo mode is a quick way to try out the game from the beginning without the need to create an account. We would recommend that you try out the updated tutorial using our new demo mode.[/quote]

Yh, but unfortinutly I am not a member (spelled it wrong I know…)

Read full topic

item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

It was a ‘minor’ update that they felt inclined to mention at the very end of the new slayer update.

RuneScape

Slayer Challenges

The other Slayer Masters have taken some inspiration from Kuradal�s lava creature challenge and have come up with their own unique tasks to put your abilities as a slayer to the test. Completing these optional missions will award you with additional...

Voices have been implemented for all NPCs (and the player) within the tutorial. We've also made demo mode available to all players on the login screen. Demo mode is a quick way to try out the game from the beginning without the need to create an account. We would recommend that you try out the updated tutorial using our new demo mode.
